T02D2974:49a-0: @49a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2974:49a-1: gzhan gyi rig sngags kyis byas pa mnan par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02D2974:49a-2: dur khrod kyi g-yam pa sngon po la dug dang
T02D2974:49a-3: khrag gis sna tshogs rdo rje bris la lte ba
T02D2974:49a-4: la che ge mo la rig sngags nan zhes pa
T02D2974:49a-5: bri / rva rnams la lam nan zhes pa bri /
T02D2974:49a-6: mu khyud la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D2974:49a-7: pa'i rig sngags thams cad stam bha ya nan zhes
T02D2974:49a-8: pa bri / de nas zhag gnyis sam gsum du
T02D2974:49a-9: aa mo gha badzra nan aom lam a'a: lam h'um
T02D2974:49a-10: lam zhes bzlas pas lam rgya gram dum nan pas
T02D2974:49a-11: bskal pa gnyis su de'i rig sngags kyi nus pa
T02D2974:49a-13: gzhan gyi rig sngags mnan pa gser gyi ri bo zhes bya ba /
